title: Can somebody explain this bug to me?
body: It's been happening to me a lot since the last patch and i have submitted a report, nothing as of yet, its the stupid bug where when you join click accept on a game it allows you to join the lobby, but the lobby doesn't actually appear and instead you sit on the home screen and have full access to all features, but if you try to join a new game it says "you're already in a game" and takes you back to the home screen..
